segments.text: Have you heard Jenny divorced her French husband ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , really ? No wonder that she looks quite depressed recently .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . They used to be joined at the hip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard they were just married for half a year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That â€™ s true . She said they often argued over nickel-and-dime things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . Mixed marriage is tempting but full of culture shock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You said it . You know , they fell in love at the first sight and quickly jumped into marriage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe they were just attracted to each other but too different to be married .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Definitely . Just hope Jenny can recover from the pain of divorce soon .
segments.speaker: S1
